p: In addition to traditional Chinese medicine prescriptions, some traditional Chinese medicine ingredients also have certain potential for the treatment of SARS-CoV-2. Baicalin is a flavonoid compound isolated from the root of Scutellaria baicalensis and has been confirmed to inhibit SARS-CoV in vitro [ 76]. Ginsenoside improves human immunity and has a curative effect on viral infection [ 77].
